parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Review historic audit logs to determine if a vulnerability identified in a {{ ra-5.8_prm_1 }} has been previously exploited within an {{ ra-5.8_prm_2 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Reviewing historic audit logs to determine if a recently detected vulnerability in a system has been previously exploited by an adversary can provide important information for forensic analyses. Such analyses can help identify, for example, the extent of a previous intrusion, the trade craft employed during the attack, organizational information exfiltrated or modified, mission or business capabilities affected, and the duration of the attack.
